thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Saturday, 21 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Azeri parliament names Novruz Mamedov as new prime minister

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Azeri parliament names Novruz Mamedov as new prime minister
text:
BAKU, April 21 (Reuters) - The Azeri parliament appointed Novruz Mamedov as the country’s new prime minister on Saturday.
Mamedov has been a foreign policy assistant to Azerbaijan’s President, Ilham Aliyev, since last year. (Reporting by Nailia Bagirova; writing by Maria Kiselyova; editing by Alexander Smith)
